org.cougaar.mts.base
Class ServerSocketWrapper

java.lang.Object
  java.net.ServerSocket
      org.cougaar.mts.base.ServerSocketWrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
FuseServerSocket, ManagedServerSocket
public abstract class ServerSocketWrapper
extends java.net.ServerSocket

This class is a delegating ServerSocket that simply passes all methods to another socket. It's handy as a base class for whatever wrapper class, if any, the SocketFactory is using.
